title: दारुल उलूम देवबन्द या मीडिया: नुसरत जहां के खिलाफ फतवा किसने जारी किया ?
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim: Days after newly elected TMC MP Nusrat Jahan applied sindoor and wore Mangalsutra for the swearing-in ceremony, Deoband clerics have issued a fatwa to the actor turned neta and said that Muslim marry only Muslims. | #NusratVsClericspic.twitter.com/M6F9SDhcUZ
